metadata.title: CVE-2019-8308 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Flatpak before 1.0.7, and 1.1.x and 1.2.x before 1.2.3, exposes /proc inthe apply_extra script sandbox, which allows attackers to modify ahost-side executable file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8308` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flatpak - 1.0.7-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
flatpak-tests - 1.0.7-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-flatpak-1.0 - 1.0.7-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libflatpak0 - 1.0.7-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flatpak package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.7-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
